title: Nicolle Wallace | Markets Plunge as Trump Lies About Coronavirus Response: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Trump's lies about the coronavirus outbreak, showing what it’s like when a lifelong scam artist is in charge of responding to a public health crisis.

He then talks to MSNBC's Nicolle Wallace, who also takes a few more questions backstage just for this podcast.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
